TopicTitle: Uh... what happened here? An easter egg?

Articles.Content: Its the toolbar mod... This is about the thousandth time a thread like this has come up

And another post about this.

This is an easter egg from a mod...

Every 3-4 weeks a thread like this appears!

One thing i don't get though is how come i never seen these screens? I had toolbar for quite a while now.

Well I didn't ever see that... Also, I'm not visiting the forums so often, seems like I missed the threads before.

But still, it's really strange.

If a mod comes by, please close the thread.
We need to sticky one of those threads to stop the madness!!

We need to sticky one of those threads to stop the madness!!

Either that or petition Blizzy to remove it from his mod.
Or aggressively close these things, and on that note...
